string.text: Regular coat of thick cloth with hood, jeans, high boots. Like it's said: got from border - go to the Zone. Outfit gives some protection from scrathes and wounds. Not effective against anomal or other harmful impact of the Zone.
This coat was stripped of stalker who died in "Buzz" anomaly. The coat lied in the anomaly for a long time and gained an ability to speed up metabolism.
Anomal coat with equipped KNIGHT exoskeleton

Being produced by handicraftsmen, stalker outfit is a wild combination of common clothes and equipment. Usually consists of light armor and outfit of rubberized cloth or tarpaulin. Often there're patches on knees and elbows for protection from injuries and tensions. Good against light firearms or small mutes. Useless for raids deep in the Zone but it's not expensive on other hand.
Stalker outfit with equipped KNIGHT exoskeleton
There're legends about Ghost who never use medkits: his wounds are healed by themselves. It's said that he had unusual outfit from anomaly.
Ghost outfit with equipped KNIGHT exoskeleton
Former owner of this outfit was a real tourist and went into far and hard raids. He knew how to allocate weight and what to get preferably. Pockets on coat and special bag reduces your power loss.
Tourist outfit with equipped KNIGHT exoskeleton

This outfit is produced by one of the military research institutes and appears to be a good choice, compared to common stalker outfits. It offers wonderful protection from the Zone. One bad thing about it is its high price.
Leather coat that is loved by bandits but with chains in lining. Everyone is capable to make one but those with patience are really succeeded.
Bandit outfit with equipped KNIGHT exoskeleton
Consists of open stalker outfit and slicker. Sinners first wore these, then Strelok's group started to equip it. Now it's an outfit for bandit commanders. Costs a fortune! But looks cool.

Outfit of "dark" veterans that is produced by bandit engineers under Fraer's guidance. Only Borov's comissars wears it. Open stalker outfit and slicker of hardened leather with lining. Steel plates provide extended bullet protection. Can't help much with protection from the Zone anomalies though. But bandits never explore anomalies by themselves.

Armored protective outfit "Duty". It's produced by one of russian MoD institutes for "Duty" faction. Simplicity and reliability of base model APO "Perm" in conjunction with new materials provides good protection from harmful impact, including firearms.
Armored protective outfit "Duty" with equipped exoskeleton
Armored protective outfit "Duty" with equipped KNIGHT exoskeleton
Armored protective outfit "Duty", Hunting Edition. Provides externded protection from mutants.
Armored protective outfit "Duty", Hunting Edition, with equipped exoskeleton
Armored protective outfit "Duty", Hunting Edition, with equipped KNIGHT exoskeleton

Product of Freedom handicraftsmen. They managed to create really good model after number of experiments with various modifications. Military outfit "UBJ" with external protective elements provides good protection from rifle bullets and shreds on some distances. Armor consists of couple of layers so protection from anomal impact is considerable. Outfit is updated constanly.
"Freedom Guard" outfit with equipped KNIGHT exoskeleton
Outfit of mercenaries. Designed according to specifications of western armies equipment. Has better protection in battles compared to stalker outfits, but is weak against anomalous impact.
Mercenary outfit with equipped KNIGHT exoskeleton
There're chains in the outfit's lining, so it has extended protection from firearms and mutant bites.

High protective outfit UPS (universal protective set) is designed for use in the Zone. It's based of universal protection systems "UPJ-1" and "UPP-1" with extra protection of electromagnetic fields, mechanical and high temperature impacts. Used by scientists and stalkers that have connections with them. Built-in air filtration and conditioning system makes outfit pretty comfortable. Isn't designed for combat actions. Has built-in night vision device.
Upgraded outfit UPSm "Cist". Extended protection of wounds and fragments. Effective protection against harmful impact. Has built-in night vision device.
Standart set of soldier equipment - cotton uniform and army bulletproof vest. Has effective protection from pistol bullets and fragments. Ineffective against anomal or other impacts.
Military uniform with equipped KNIGHT exoskeleton

Beryl-5 is an army specops equipment, modified for use in the Zone. It includes: army bulletproof vest of BJSN series and Sphere-08 helmet with antiradiation layer of beryl. Designed for combat operations in places with elevated radiation. Not quite effective in places with high anomal activity.
Cloth of outfit lining is impregnated with antiseptic and coagulating compound which boosts wound healing.

Protective Special Outfit SCAT-M was designed for military stalkers. It includes: heavy army bulletproof vest of UBJ-5 series, built-in compensating suit, Lynx-T helmet, CFP "Gamma". Provides excellent protection from firewounds and fragments. Has balanced anomal protection system. Has telepathic impact protection.
PSO SCAT-M with equipped KNIGHT exoskeleton
Outfit of "Monolith" faction, origin is unknown. Looks like common stalker outfit but slightly better than it, especially in radiation protection. Has a strange device near head and back.

There's strange attachment inside outift near the spine and in helmet. It looks like attachments in common "Monolith" outfits, but polarity of this "device" is opposite to those in common suits. In conjunction with grounding this attachment turns out a powerful current collector providing strong telepathic protection. Obvoiusly, this is a suit for use in places with high psychotronic emissions or for experiments with psy-mutants. Looks like this outfit was a prototype for common "Monolith" outfits.
Strange "Monolith" outfit with equipped KNIGHT exoskeleton

Exoskeleton attached to protective suit. Origin is unknown. Consists of material with addition of some strange metal or alloy whose composition is unknown. Exoskeleton isn't powerful, but very mobile. Small weight and good protection. Maximum protection from radiation. Has a strange attachment near head and back.

Experimental sample of light army exoskeleton of "Fighter-21" project. Was designed for carrying weight. Wasn't produced massively due to high price and some design mistakes. Nonetheless, it's produced in small quantities. Stalkers don't like it because of complex maintenance. Can be equipped over any outfit that allows mounting to back, hands and legs.

Combat exoskeleton. Produced by special order in classified russian military SPU. Has high mobility and low weight due to composites, advanced power source and "artificial muscules" technology, but maximum carrying weight is reduced. Can be equipped over any outfit that allows mounting to back, hands and legs.
Exoskeleton provides excelent protection of wounds and fragments, but slows his host. Can be damaged with armor piercing ammo.
Military outfit was designed for combat operations. Provides excellent protection of wounds and fragments, has good mobility. Can be damaged with armor piercing ammo.

This outfit was designed for scientific activity in the Zone. Has closed air purification system and built-in system of the inhibition of anomaly impacts, so it's best against anomalies. Very fragile due to low protection. Has built-in container for artifacts.
